mcq.statement: Which major administrative decision regarding Bengal was taken during Lord Hardinge of Penshurst's tenure as Viceroy?
mcq.one_liner: During Lord Hardinge of Penshurst's tenure as Viceroy, the **Partition of Bengal was cancelled**.
